      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<ContextContract> generateCandidates(int supertypeID, int requiredID, ResolutionNode resolutionTree)
      This method generates a list os all components candidates to a contract but only in the highest level, it will be refined.
      static java.util.List<ContextContract> generateCompliantPlatformCandidates(int requiredID, ResolutionNode resolutionTree)
      This method generates a set of platforms stored in core
      static ResolutionNode generateResolutionTree()
      This method generates all resolution tree of abstract components
      static ResolutionNode generateResolutionTree(java.lang.Integer i, ResolutionNode tree, java.util.List<ContextParameterType> cps, java.util.List<QualityParameterType> qps, java.util.List<CostParameterType> cops, java.util.List<RankingParameterType> rps, java.lang.String parentPath)
      This method generates a resolution tree from an specified node All abstract components must be a subtype of root or another subtype off root, because if not, this component won't be catched.
